name: Kerk en IT Parish
author: Kerk en IT

sections.description:
With this plugin you extend your parish website. With lot’s of cool features.

This plugin will include:

  • Widget with the times of the masses in your parish
  • A administration backend for fill in all necessary data witch are included in the widgets.
sections.installation:
1. From WP admin > Plugins > Add New
  2. Search “Kerk en IT Parish” under search and hit Enter
  3. Click “Install Now”
  4. Click the Activate Plugin link
sections.faq:
Do I have to fill in duplicate data?

No, this plugin will minimize the filled data. It’s all connect to each other

Do you have a roadmap?

Yes we have. We have great ideas for extending this plugin. Here some great things in the pipeline. Please provide us feedback for any request.

I miss data of my language?

Currently this plugin will work perfectly in the Netherlands. We will add support for your language / country. But we need YOUR help.

How can I contribute?

You can help us by providing data of your local dioceses. Also we are looking for translators. Please contact us, and we will add support for your country.
sections.changelog:
0.2.1

  • Removed sample data
  • Fixed issue of adding masses in batch
  • Fixed issue with adding hour

0.2.0

  • Fixed uninstall hook. Fixed double data insert on activation.

0.1.1

  • Added mass times and mass types to the widget

0.1

  • Introduction of plugin
